    illonis

    • Method Detail

      • getBaseDir

        public static URL getBaseDir()
        Retrieves the path where the programm jar is located.
        Returns:
        the jar's location.

      • findFileRelative

        public static URI findFileRelative(String fileName)
        Returns an url that points to a file relative to program folder.
        The path is built by combining getBaseDir() with the fileName.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file name.
        Returns:
        a URI pointing to that file.

      • findFileAbsolute

        public static URL findFileAbsolute(String fileName)
        Returns an url that points to a the file specified
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file name.
        Returns:
        a URI pointing to that file.
